item.description: Post thesis on OSM, I've been thinking a lot about the wider landscape of free and open. Does the free/open divide of F/OSS apply across the wider landscape of open knowledge more broadly? Open scholarship? Open data? Who has power? Who doesn't? Who is (in)visible? What is free?
